document_data.mainbody: Divisav Irithyl was the first son of Kahvoerm Irithyl and the second of the family line to attempt to draw the Rulers Blade and become the Coronal of Cormanthyr in . Unlike his father and all of his line to follow, Divisav failed on account of his greed and was consumed by the elfblade. He died instantly in a bout of arcane green fire. The blade was thus passed to Kahvoerms youngest great-grandson, Sakrattars Irithyl, who become second Coronal.
